product.title: SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022 (Get Daily Targets)
product.sub_title: SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022
product.short_description:
Enrol for our  SBI PO Prelims and get High Standard & Exact Exam Level Questions Daily for Practice. 

Course Duration: 25days       No.of Ques: 2800+      Validity: 1 Year
product.description:
SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022:

This Bundle PDF Course is specially designed for SBI PO Prelims examination. This Prelims package contains more than 2800+ questions in all sections. It contains questions and their detailed solutions are available as Video format!!! For a clearer insight of beginners.

Subjects covered for Mains exam

1.Quantitative Aptitude

2.Reasoning Ability

3.English Language

What is the importance of this SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022? Why us?

  • Course Duration: 25 Days
  • It is an all-rounder course which is specially designed in covering the subjects and the topics related to SBI PO Prelims Exam in Exact Expected Level.
  • As the Answer Key is available in PDF format, you can take the Printout separately and make use of it. This is an added advantage.
  • For beginners who find it difficult to understand the solution, Video solutions are available too !!! in this Bundle PDF Course.
  • Questions are available in bilingual format (English and Hindi).
  • We assure you that Standard and New Pattern SBI PO Prelims level questions which will be asked in exams are available here.
  • Without further delay, Enroll yourself to Avail this SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022 Yours.

We assure you that after the completion of 25 days, this SBI PO Prelims Bundle PDF Crash Course 2022 will make you succeed in your exams with flying colors.

Enroll now and take the final step towards your success.
